name: Empyrean Swarm
description:
Embrace the power of your adaptable fighter, the lone survivor of your once-mighty fleet. In the midst of a relentless pursuit by a shadowy adversary, you'll feed off the energy of vanquished enemy vessels, desperately fighting to escape the ominous clutches of an enigmatic nemesis who hungers for dominion over not just your technology but your very flesh.

Conquer formidable boss battles while you surf the cosmic tides created by the wreckage of your alien foes. Evolve and strategize your path to supremacy by leveling up and making pivotal choices as you navigate a riveting narrative.




Fight waves of enemies as you try to escape your doom. Gain experience to upgrade your ships weapons and powers.





Kill tons of bosses and gain new powers and ship systems to help you survive and escape the alien threat!




Once you complete the campaign, step up to the global stage in an endless Rogue-like game type with tons of new enemies and abilities--rack up points and compete arcade-style against the world! Will you be the one to rise to the top?



Join the community and follow the game development in our discord!
